channel.title: Chosen client 317 drqgon claw emotes godsword emotes much more
channel.description:
Well i really wanted to create a client full of emotes, to create a perfect runescape 2 pking remake.
Some Features Runescape teleports 95% Defender blocks New right click feature Godsword emotes ( Bandos godsword 525 special) Karils 474 emote, Rune C'bow Emote All BarrelChest Anchor Emotes.. Standing, Walking, Attacking, Running, Special Dragon bolts emerald bolts etc special attacks. Dragon Claws 525 Special attack Has lots of updated items, vesta, statius, morrigans, all spirit shields!! -------------------------------------- Heres a few pictures Anchor Special Attack [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/29dxz50.jpg[/img]
Dragon Claws Special Attack [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2s12h5c.jpg[/img]
Bandos Godsword Special Attack [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1zwfdvm.jpg[/img]
---------------------------------- Downloads
Item id list http://uppit.com/v/6IQC0ONP
Client Download -**************************removed faggot cant appreciate shit
